text: McCartney began writing Here, There and Everywhere at Lennon's house in Weybridge while waiting for Lennon to wake up. He recalled: "I sat out by the pool on one of the sun chairs with my guitar and started strumming in E. And soon had a few chords, and I think by the time he'd woken up, I had pretty much written the song, so we took it indoors and finished it up."
